mutants.original_line: """Remove key-value pairs with odd values from a dictionary, preserving order."""
return {key: value for key, value in input_dict.items() if value % 2 == 0}
mutants.mutated_line: return {key: value for (key, value) in input_dict.items() if value % 2 != 0}
